text: vertebral bodies - Large fontanelles - Long philtrum - Metaphyseal cupping - Polyhydramnios - Posterior rib cupping - Protuberant abdomen - Rhizomelia - Severe platyspondyly - Short foot - Short long bone - Short neck - Short palm - Squared iliac bones - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
